iti78:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti78:2.1: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
iti78:2.2: Those who have bad convictions come together and converge with those who have bad convictions.
iti78:2.3: Those who have good convictions come together and converge with those who have good convictions.
iti78:5.1: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
iti78:5.2: Those who have bad convictions come together and converge with those who have bad convictions.
iti78:5.3: Those who have good convictions come together and converge with those who have good convictions.”
